SEARCH
Package com.grassnext.grassnextserver.locationdata

Class LocationDataService

java.lang.Object
com.grassnext.grassnextserver.locationdata.LocationDataService
@Service public class LocationDataService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing REST operations related to LocationData entities.

    Class

    static class 
    LocationDataService.LocationDataJson
    A class representing location data in JSON format, designed for deserialization of location details.
    static class 
    LocationDataService.NodeListJson
    This class represents a JSON structure used to manage the deserialization of a list of nodes.

  • Field Details

    • HOST_REVERSE_GEOCODING

      public static String HOST_REVERSE_GEOCODING
      A constant string representing the URL endpoint for reverse geocoding using the Nominatim OpenStreetMap API. This endpoint is used to retrieve geographic information based on coordinate data.

    • HOST_OSM_LOCATION_DATA

      public static String HOST_OSM_LOCATION_DATA
      A constant that holds the URL endpoint for the Overpass API interpreter. This URL is used to interact with OpenStreetMap (OSM) location data by sending queries to the Overpass API.

    • locationDataRepository

      LocationDataRepository locationDataRepository
      Dependency-injected repository used to perform CRUD operations on LocationData entities.

    • objectMapper

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper
      ObjectMapper is an instance of the Jackson library's ObjectMapper class. This class is used to map Java objects to JSON and JSON to Java objects.

      Constructs a new instance of LocationDataService.

  • Method Details

    • getOverpassNodesData

      public LocationData getOverpassNodesData(double longitude, double latitude, String deviceId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Fetches location data including nearby nodes by querying Overpass API based on the given longitude and latitude. The method attempts to find the closest nodes that match the required criteria and saves the data in the repository.
      Parameters:
      longitude - the longitude of the location for the query
      latitude - the latitude of the location for the query
      deviceId - the unique identifier of the topo device
      Returns:
      a LocationData object containing details such as location name, start and end nodes, and nearby road node IDs; or null if no sufficient data is retrieved
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there's an error during the processing of JSON data

    • getLocationName

      private String getLocationName(LocationData ld) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Retrieves and constructs the location name based on the provided geographic coordinates encapsulated in the LocationData object by making use of a reverse geocoding API. Updates the location details of the LocationData object and builds a string representation of the location.
      Parameters:
      ld - the LocationData object containing latitude, longitude, and device ID information, which will also be updated with additional location details such as road, town, state, and country
      Returns:
      a string representing the formatted location information, including the device ID and geographic coordinates
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if an error occurs while processing the JSON response from the reverse geocoding API

    • getCountryList

      public List<String> getCountryList()
      Retrieves a list of countries from the data repository.
      Returns:
      a list of country names

    • getStateList

      public List<String> getStateList(String country)
      Retrieves a list of states for the specified country from the repository.
      Parameters:
      country - the name of the country for which the states are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of state names within the specified country

    • getTownList

      public List<String> getTownList(String country, String state)
      Retrieves a list of towns based on the specified country and state.
      Parameters:
      country - the name of the country to filter towns
      state - the name of the state to filter towns
      Returns:
      a list of towns that belong to the specified country and state
